title.rendered: Join Me When I Present at the World Tour Chicago

content.rendered:
Hello all!  One Thursday June 15th, 2017 in Chicago, IL at the McCormick Place, I will be presenting at the Salesforce World Tour, 3:00 pm sharp. Be there or be square! But seriously, it should be a good time. 

How much do you know about Salesforce Communities? A lot? A little? Eh? No matter your experience level, there will be info and best practices for you.  I will be reviewing Template Communities and the OOTB (out of the box) Lighting Components.  If you have never considered using a Salesforce Community because you didn’t think you had a use case, I bet you do, seriously, they are so awesome.  Not only that, they are so feature rich!! 

Stop on by my session, and don’t forget to say hi after!

excerpt.rendered: Join me in Chicago 6/15 3 pm, when I present at the Salesforce World Tour on Communities!

jetpack-related-posts.title: Salesforce Events 2020
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: The Salesforce Events 2020 is live!! That's right Ohana, it wouldn't be my blog if I wasn't talking about events and how we connect and get together as humans.  For real, we get out from behind the keyboard, and even leave the HOUSE!!! I know, it's crazy, but for Ohana,…

jetpack-related-posts.title: CMS Connect for WordPress
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: So you want to connect your WordPress site to your Community? Here's how it's done with CMS Connect.

jetpack-related-posts.title: Dreamforce 18 – The Thursday of Presentations
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: This Dreamforce was c-razy!! Not only was it my first Dreamforce as an MVP, but it was also the Dreamforce of back to back action for me. Here's a bit about my #DF18 adventure...

jetpack-related-posts.title: Features You Need To Contact Salesforce For
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Ever wonder what features you need to contact Salesforce to activate or deactivate? Check out the community doc and submit other features you have learned require Salesforce Support.

jetpack-related-posts.title: Idea: Vote For a Mobile Community
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Call to Action:  Salesforce Users, Devs, Admins, Please vote for a mobile Community app! YES YES YES Please! I I was just searching for one online. To be able to get immediate answers to Q's notifications when the hashtags followed are used, and when new Q`s in our area of…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Salesforce Events 2018
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Find out about the 2018 Salesforce Event, when they are and where. Link to the 2018 Salesforce events calendar and form for to submit updates and new events
